Producer: Tim Bevan, Eric Fellner, Mark Huffam
Screenwriter: Michael McCullers, William Osborne, Peter Hewitt
Production Co: Working Title Films, Tracy Films Ltd
Genre: Kids & Family, Sci-Fi, Adventure, Action, Fantasy
Synopsis: Former astronaut Jeff Tracy (Bill Paxton) runs International Rescue, a top-secret heroic organization, from his headquarters on Tracy Island. The island also houses the futuristic vehicles created by Ray "Brains" Hackenbacker (Anthony Edwards). But while Jeff is on a mission in space, his nemesis, The Hood (Ben Kingsley), invades Tracy Island. The Hood plots to use the island's technology for evil, and only Jeff's son, Alan (Brady Corbet), can stop him.
Title: Thunderbirds
